Apple___Apple_scab.symptoms: Olive-green spots on leaves, dark scabby lesions on fruit
Apple___Apple_scab.treatment: Apply fungicides containing captan or mancozeb, remove infected leaves
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper pruning, remove fallen leaves

Apple___Black_rot.symptoms: Brown spots on leaves, black rot on fruit, cankers on branches
Apple___Black_rot.treatment: Apply fungicides containing captan, remove infected plant parts
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper pruning, remove infected plant parts

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.symptoms: Yellow spots on leaves, orange gelatinous growths on leaves and fruit
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.treatment: Apply fungicides containing myclobutanil, remove nearby cedar trees
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, remove nearby cedar trees, maintain proper spacing

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with gray centers and dark borders on leaves
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot.treatment: Apply fungicides containing azoxystrobin or pyraclostrobin, remove infected leaves
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, practice crop rotation, maintain proper plant spacing
recommendations: Remove and destroy infected plant debris

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust.treatment: Apply fungicides containing azoxystrobin or pyraclostrobin, remove infected leaves
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, practice crop rotation, maintain proper plant spacing
recommendations: Remove and destroy infected plant debris

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.treatment: Apply fungicides containing mancozeb or chlorothalonil, remove infected leaves
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, practice crop rotation, maintain proper plant spacing
recommendations: Remove and destroy infected plant debris

Grape___Black_rot.symptoms: Black, circular lesions on leaves and fruit
Grape___Black_rot.treatment: Apply fungicides containing captan or thiophanate-methyl, remove infected plant parts
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper pruning, remove infected plant parts

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).symptoms: Dark, circular lesions on leaves and fruit
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).treatment: Apply fungicides containing captan or thiophanate-methyl, remove infected plant parts
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper pruning, remove infected plant parts

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.symptoms: Dark, circular lesions on leaves and fruit
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.treatment: Apply fungicides containing captan or thiophanate-methyl, remove infected plant parts
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper pruning, remove infected plant parts

Potato___Early_blight.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on leaves, yellowing of older leaves
Potato___Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil, remove infected leaves
Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper spacing, avoid overhead watering

Potato___Late_blight.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems, white fungal growth on underside
Potato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply copper-based fungicides, remove and destroy infected plants
Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper spacing, avoid overhead watering

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with gray centers and dark borders on leaves
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply fungicides containing mancozeb or chlorothalonil, remove infected leaves
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, practice crop rotation, maintain proper plant spacing
recommendations: Remove and destroy infected plant debris

Tomato___Early_blight.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on leaves, yellowing of older leaves, stem lesions
Tomato___Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or copper, remove infected leaves
Tomato___Early_blight.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper plant spacing, avoid overhead watering
recommendations: Use mulch to prevent soil splash

Tomato___Late_blight.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems, white fungal growth on underside of leaves
Tomato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply copper-based fungicides, remove and destroy infected plants
Tomato___Late_blight.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper spacing, avoid overhead watering

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surface, grayish-white mold on underside
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.treatment: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil, improve air circulation
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper spacing, control humidity

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with gray centers and dark borders on leaves
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.treatment: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil, remove infected leaves
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, avoid overhead watering, maintain proper spacing

Tomato___Spider_mites.symptoms: Fine webbing on leaves, stippled or bronzed leaves, leaf drop
Tomato___Spider_mites.treatment: Apply miticides, increase humidity, use predatory mites
Tomato___Spider_mites.prevention: Regular monitoring, maintain proper humidity, avoid water stress

Tomato___Target_Spot.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings, yellow halos around spots
Tomato___Target_Spot.treatment: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil, remove infected leaves
Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper spacing, avoid overhead watering

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.symptoms: Upward curling of leaves, yellowing, stunted growth
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.treatment: Remove infected plants, control whitefly population
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Use virus-resistant varieties, control whiteflies, use reflective mulches

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.symptoms: Mottled light and dark green patterns on leaves, leaf distortion
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.prevention: Use virus-resistant varieties, control aphids, practice good hygiene
